DOC.HEADLINE: FILM , TV NOMINEES FOR THE GOLDEN GLOBES
DOC.TEXT: The nominees for the 52nd annual Golden Globe Awards : FILMS Motion_Picture -- Drama : " Forrest Gump , " Paramount Pictures ; " Legends of the Fall , " TriStar Pictures ; " Nell , " Egg Pictures , 20th Century Fox and PolyGram ; " Pulp Fiction , " A Band Apart , Miramax Films ; " Quiz Show , " Hollywood Pictures , Buena Vista Pictures Dist . Inc. * Motion_Picture Musical or Comedy : " The Adventures of Priscilla : Queen of the Desert , " Latent Image Productions , PolyGram Film International ; " Ed Wood , " Touchstone Pictures , Buena Vista Pictures Dist . Inc. ; " Four Weddings and a Funeral , " Working Title Films , Gramercy Pictures / PolyGram Film International ; " The Lion King , " Walt Disney Pictures , Buena Vista Pictures Distribution ; " Ready to Wear ( Pret-a-Porter ) , " Pret Productions , Miramax Films . * Actress , Drama : Jodie Foster , " Nell " ; Jessica Lange , " Blue_Sky " ; Jennifer Jason Leigh , " Mrs . Parker and the Vicious_Circle " ; Miranda Richardson , " Tom & Viv " ; Meryl Streep , " The River Wild. " * Actor , Drama : Morgan Freeman , " The Shawshank Redemption " ; Tom Hanks , " Forrest Gump " ; Paul Newman , " Nobody ' s Fool " ; Brad Pitt , " Legends of the Fall " ; John Travolta , " Pulp Fiction. " * Actress , Musical or Comedy : Jamie Lee Curtis , " True Lies " ; Geena Davis , " Speechless " ; Andie MacDowell , " Four Weddings and a Funeral " ; Shirley MacLaine , " Guarding Tess " ; Emma Thompson , " Junior. " * Actor , Musical or Comedy : Jim Carrey , " The Mask " ; Johnny Depp , " Ed Wood " ; Hugh Grant , " Four Weddings and a Funeral " ; Arnold Schwarzenegger , " Junior " ; Terence Stamp , " The Adventures of Priscilla : Queen of the Desert. " * Foreign Language Motion_Picture : " Eat Drink Man Woman , " Central M.P. Corp . Prods. , the Samuel Goldwyn Co. , Taiwan ; " Farinelli , " Stephan Films , K2 Productions , UGC Images , Sony Pictures Classics , Belgium ; " Queen Margot , " Renn Prods. , Miramax Films , France ; " Red , " CAB Prods. , Miramax Films , Switzerland ; " To Live , " ERA International ( HK ) Ltd , the Samuel Goldwyn Co. , Hong Kong . * Supporting Actress : Kirsten Dunst , " Interview With the Vampire " ; Sophia Loren , " Ready to Wear ( Pret-a-Porter ) " ; Uma Thurman , " Pulp Fiction " ; Dianne Wiest , " Bullets Over Broadway " ; Robin Wright , " Forrest Gump. " * Supporting Actor : Kevin Bacon , " The River Wild " ; Samuel L . Jackson , " Pulp Fiction " ; Martin Landau , " Ed Wood " ; Gary Sinise , " Forrest Gump " ; John Turturro , " Quiz Show. " * Director : Robert Redford , " Quiz Show " ; Oliver Stone , " Natural Born Killers " ; Quentin Tarantino , " Pulp Fiction " ; Robert Zemeckis , " Forrest Gump " ; Edward Zwick , " Legends of the Fall. " * Screenplay : Paul Attanasio , " Quiz Show " ; Richard Curtis , " Four Weddings and a Funeral " ; Frank Darabont , " The Shawshank Redemption " ; Eric Roth , " Forrest Gump " ; Quentin Tarantino , " Pulp Fiction. " * Original Score : Elliot Goldenthal , " Interview With the Vampire " ; James Horner , " Legends of the Fall " ; Mark Isham , " Nell " ; Alan Silvestri , " Forrest Gump " ; Hans Zimmer , " The Lion King. " * Original Song : " Can You Feel the Love Tonight " ( " The Lion King " ) music by Elton John , lyrics by Tim Rice ; " Circle of Life " ( " The Lion King " ) music by Elton John , lyrics by Tim Rice ; " The Color of the Night " ( " The Color of Night " ) music and lyrics by Jud J . Friedman , Lauren Christy and Dominic Frontiere ; " Far Longer Than Forever " ( " The Swan Princess " ) music by Lex De Azevedo , lyrics by David Zippel ; " I ' ll Remember " ( " With Honors " ) music and lyrics by Patrick Leonard , Madonna and Richard Page ; " Look What Love Has Done " ( " Junior " ) music and lyrics by Carole Bayer-Sager , James Ingram , James Newton Howard , Patty Smyth . TELEVISION Series , Drama : " Chicago Hope , " CBS ; " ER , " NBC ; " NYPD Blue , " ABC ; " Picket_Fences , " CBS ; " The X-Files , " Fox . * Actress , Drama : Kathy Baker , " Picket_Fences " ; Claire Danes , " My So-Called Life " ; Angela Lansbury , " Murder , She Wrote " ; Heather Locklear , " Melrose Place " ; Jane Seymour , " Dr. Quinn , Medicine Woman. " * Actor , Drama : Dennis Franz , " NYPD Blue " ; Mandy Patinkin , " Chicago Hope " ; Jason Priestley , " Beverly Hills , 90210 " ; Tom Skerritt , " Picket_Fences " ; Sam Waterston , " Law & Order. " * Series , Musical or Comedy : " Frasier , " NBC ; " Grace Under Fire , " ABC ; " Home Improvement , " ABC ; " Mad About You , " NBC ; " Seinfeld , " NBC . * Actress , Musical or Comedy : Candice Bergen , " Murphy Brown " ; Brett Butler , " Grace Under Fire " ; Ellen DeGeneres , " Ellen " ; Helen Hunt , " Mad About You " ; Patricia Richardson , " Home Improvement. " * Actor , Musical or Comedy : Tim Allen , " Home Improvement " ; Kelsey Grammer , " Frasier " ; Craig T . Nelson , " Coach " ; Paul Reiser , " Mad About You " ; Jerry Seinfeld , " Seinfeld " ; Garry Shandling , " The Larry Sanders Show. " * Miniseries or Motion_Picture : " The Burning Season , " HBO ; " Fatherland , " HBO ; " The Return of the Native , " CBS ; " Roswell , " Showtime ; " White Mile , " HBO . * Actress , Miniseries or Motion_Picture : Kirstie Alley , " David ' s Mother " ; Irene Bedard , " Lakota Woman : Siege at Wounded Knee " ; Diane Keaton , " Amelia Earhart : The Final Flight " ; Diana Ross , " Out of Darkness " ; Joanne Woodward , " Breathing Lessons -- A Hallmark Hall_of_Fame Presentation. " * Actor , Miniseries or Motion_Picture : Alan Alda , " White Mile " ; James Garner , " Breathing Lessons -- A Hallmark Hall_of_Fame Presentation " ; Rutger Hauer , " Fatherland " ; Samuel L . Jackson , " Against the Wall " ; Raul Julia , " The Burning Season. " * Supporting Actress : Sonia Braga , " The Burning Season " ; Tyne Daly , " Christy " ; Jane Leeves , " Frasier " ; Laura Leighton , " Melrose Place " ; Julia Louis-Dreyfus , " Seinfeld " ; Laurie Metcalf , " Roseanne " ; Miranda Richardson , " Fatherland " ; Liz Torres , " The John Larroquette Show " ; Leigh Taylor Young , " Picket Fences. " * Supporting Actor : Jason Alexander , " Seinfeld " ; Fyvush Finkel , " Picket_Fences " ; John Malkovich , " Heart of Darkness " ; Edward James Olmos , " The Burning Season " ; David Hyde Pierce , " Frasier. "
